title: AzLTables
description: Gather information from the Azur Lane Wiki (Information Website for Mobile Game) and view all collected information in one place, displayed in an easy-to-view format. Fleet management functions included.

title: AzLEList
description: A site for organising Azur Lane (Mobile Game) Equipment data. Perform sorts and mark your own equipment for faster reference and comparison.

title: ABDUCTION
description: 2d side-scrolling danmaku (bullet-dodging) game made for the UMBC games development class. "Pick up people and drop them, and don't get hit."

title: Ellephant
description: A Kantai Collection (Browser Game) viewer with a focus on providing only the most relevant information and look good while doing it.

title: Anitrack
description: Chrome extension integrating with online service Anilist to enhance and provide additional features.

title: IgAViewer
description: Website for advanced viewing of an Imgur (image-hosting website) Album.

title: Anigen
description: Website for production of graphical Television Program Charts based on data from a user's Anilist account for any particular year and season.

title: Distractlands
description: UMBC software engineering political districting project. Uses Google Maps API to colour Maryland pretty colours, and is very Red.

title: BShuffle
description: Chrome extension that compensates for the Bandcamp (Online Music Album Distribution Platform) web service's overwhelming lack of a shuffle button.

title: Youtube Video Position Saver
description: Chrome extension that allows bookmarking of YouTube videos at their current time position, so they can be watched later.

title: expandimgur
description: Revamp Imgur (image-hosting website) user image pages by increasing support for wider screens in addition to other small modifications.

title: steamtiles
description: Designed to enhance the Steam (Online Game Digital Distribution Platform) store browsing experience by showing each games' header image.

title: imgurtabber
description: Mobile-intended website for opening many links in new tabs at once.

title: anirandomise
description: Have a folder full of videos and don't know what to watch?  This Python script chooses for you.  Includes logging capabilities if you're paranoid it's been picking the same thing over and over again (it might actually be).

title: bgmswitcher
description: A website that lets you [relatively] seamlessly switch between the sounds of chosen YouTube videos at will.

title: fcardsK
description: Mobile website for Kanji practise with a unique visual system.
